Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Aqua Resort Busselton in Broadwater, you'll be on the beach and close to Busselton District Hospital. This 5-star hotel is within the vicinity of Busselton Jetty and Busselton Jetty Underwater Observatory.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 41 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and plasma televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Kitchens are outfitted with full-sized refrigerators/freezers, stovetops, and microwaves. Cable programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), a picnic area, and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
The front desk is staffed during limited hours. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Busselton District Hospital - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Busselton Jetty - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Busselton Jetty Underwater Observatory - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi

The preferred airport for Aqua Resort Busselton is Perth, WA (PER) - 202.5 km / 125.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
